data.title: Official Website of Valpo Athletics
data.text:
2023 CSC Academic All-District

2024: Started all 52 of the team’s games, one of two players on the team to do so... Ranked third on the team in batting average at .279... Posted a .308 batting average in league play, third on the team... Had eight extra-base hits in his 27 conference games including two home runs... Totaled nine doubles, one triple and six home runs... Drove in 20 runs and scored 29... Reached base at a .373 clip and slugged .448... Had four hits, reached base five times and drove in three on March 8 in the second game of a doubleheader at The Citadel... Finished with 431 career assists, fourth in program history... Ranked eighth in the MVC in assists with 132 and tied for seventh in fielding double plays with 31... Earned Valparaiso University Presidential Academic honors.

2024: Started all 52 of the team’s games, one of two players on the team to do so... Ranked third on the team in batting average at .279... Posted a .308 batting average in league play, third on the team... Had eight extra-base hits in his 27 conference games including two home runs... Totaled nine doubles, one triple and six home runs... Drove in 20 runs and scored 29... Reached base at a .373 clip and slugged .448... Had four hits, reached base five times and drove in three on March 8 in the second game of a doubleheader at The Citadel... Finished with 431 career assists, foruth in program history... Ranked eighth in the MVC in assists with 132 and tied for seventh in fielding double plays with 31... Earned Valparaiso University Presidential Academic honors.

2023: Played in 46 games – all starts – while posting a .238 batting average… Drove in 17 runs and scored 19… Had 11 extra-base hits including a triple and a pair of home runs… Earned College Sports Communicators Academic All-District honors… Received Valparaiso University Presidential Academic Honors… Hit home runs on March 5 at Little Rock and May 24 vs. Belmont in the MVC Tournament… Collected four hits on May 7 vs. Southern Illinois.

2022: Finished second on the team in batting average by hitting .301 in 47 games, all starts... After hitting .158 in 2021, made a significant jump during his sophomore season... Posted a career-high five hits on April 29 at Southern Illinois, the team that eventually finished atop the MVC regular-season standings... Became the first Valpo player with a five-hit effort since Scott Kapers on May 8, 2018 vs. Western Michigan... Accrued 11 doubles, three triples and one home run while driving in 16 runs and scoring 20... Finished with a .357 on-base percentage and .409 slugging percentage.

2021: Appeared in 40 games and made 39 starts… Lashed 19 hits including five doubles and two triples… Posted nine RBIs, 21 walks and 12 runs scored… Had two hits and drove in two in the April 27 game at No. 8 Notre Dame… Posted a season-high three hits including a triple on May 15 in the second game of a doubleheader vs. Evansville… Member of MVC Academic Honor Roll.

Prep (Athletic): Three-year all-conference honoree and one-year academic all-state recipient… Four-year letter winner on the diamond… Also earned four letters in tennis and one in basketball… Played nine years of travel baseball for Northern Stars Baseball, from 9U to 17U.

Prep (Academic): Member of National Honor Society, Spanish Honor Society and Council for Academic Excellence… Won the 2019 Nanoline Automation national championship with three classmates. The winning project created by the Benton Central team was an automated paint brush cleaner… Finished as the Valedictorian of his senior class.
